text: (nabiye!) niyapotu æti satun, (ven novuna kura æti otuvan, gini kukulan, pattayin adi) siyalla (aharayata nogata yutuya yayi) yudevvanta api tahanam kara tibunemu. tavada elu, gava adiyehida, evaye pita kondehida, nætahot kusehi ho nætahot ilaæta samaga muhu vi ho æti dæya hæra, (anit kotasvala æti) medayada, api ovunta tahanam kara tibunemu. ovun (apata) veskam kirima nisa danduvam vasayen mese ovunta (tahanam kara) danduvam kara tibunemu. niyata vasayenma apima ætta kiyannemu. (meyata venasva pavasana yudevvan borukarayinya)
